original_text: Now the donkeys belonging to Saul’s father Kish were lost, and Kish said to his son Saul, “Take one of the servants with you and go and look for the donkeys.”
korean_text: 사울의 아버지 기스가 암나귀들을 잃고 그의 아들 사울에게 이르되 너는 일어나 한 사환을 데리고 가서 암나귀들을 찾으라 하매

sentences.original_text: Now the donkeys belonging to Saul's father Kish were lost
sentences.korean_translation: 사울의 아버지 기스에게 속한 나귀들이 길을 잃었는데

sentences.original_text: and Kish said to his son Saul
Take one of the servants with you
sentences.korean_translation: 종 중 한 명을 데리고 가서

sentences.original_text: and go and look for the donkeys
